title: Provide Information on Parking
description: A visitor planning a trip to a botanical garden wants to know about parking availability and cost.

tasks.description: Identify the attraction (botanical garden) and the query (parking).
Retrieve parking information from the attraction's knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that there is an on-site parking garage that costs $15 per day.

tasks.description: Communicate the parking details, including location and cost, to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly provides the correct parking information.
